Items.Title: Application no. 20125038 SCR, a proposed site for a new, approximately 444 seat Primary School Facility, P.S. 62R to be located at Crabtree Avenue (Block 7092, Lots 39 and 75), Community School District No. 31, Borough of Staten Island, Council District 51.
